title: Top IMF official to visit Sri Lanka
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A Senior Official of the International MonetaryFund (IMF) will pay a visit to Sri Lanka on Monday (14) and Tuesday (15) to brief Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa of the IMF assessment of the current economic crisis.
This was confirmed by Sri Lanka mission chief Masahiro Nozaki.
Further, the IMF has not yet received a request from Sri Lanka, however, they said that if there are any requests from Sri Lanka it would be open for discussion.
Cut taxes on fuel, says Gammanpila while asking why SLPP is silent on price hike?
